General.Name: Sherpa II Holdings Corp
General.Description: Sherpa II Holdings Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company holds an 80% interest in the Bakar Claims, which comprises of eight mineral claims located in northwestern Vancouver Island, British Columbia. Sherpa II Holdings Corp. was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1030 West Georgia Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2Y3
